mapper.update:

COMPANY_ID=#{companyId},

CONTACT=#{contact},
TEL=#{tel},
BILL_DATE=#{billDate},
START_DATE=#{startDate},
END_DATE=#{endDate},
EQUIPMENT_ID=#{equipmentId},
ADDRESS=#{address},
LINE_ACCESS=#{lineAccess},
LINE_USE_TYPE=#{lineUseType},
IS_INSTALL_OPERATION=#{isInstallOperation},
IS_CONFIG_IP=#{isConfigIp},
IS_SPACE_SATISFIED=#{isSpaceSatisfied},
IS_ELECTRICITY_SATISFIED=#{isElectricitySatisfied},
REAL_LINE_ACCESS=#{realLineAccess},
INT_DATE=#{intDate},
IS_REMOTE_CLOSE=#{isRemoteClose},
AFTER_DOWN=#{afterDown},
EQUIPMENT_CHECK_RESULT=#{equipmentCheckResult},
CLOSE_RESULT=#{closeResult},
DOWN_EQUIPMENT_LIST=#{downEquipmentList},
HAVE_AFTER_OPERATE=#{haveAfterOperate},
OPERATION_TYPE=#{operationType},
OPERATION_TYPE_IMG=#{operationTypeImg},
MACHINA=#{machina},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},
CAOZGCS_NAME=#{caozgcsName},
STATUS=#{status},

DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_DATE3=#{extDate3},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
